long_description: The purpose-built Mountain Hardwear Splitter 40 Pack hauls your gear to the crag in comfort, then zips wide open and lays out flat to put everything you need at your fingertips. HardWave suspension conforms comfortably to the curve of your back and distributes weight evenly; framesheet is removable for carrying light loads. Padded hipbelt with gear loops adds stability when needed. Stowable rope strap deploys when needed and hides away when it's not being used. Large clamshell opening provides easy access to all gear. Internal compression panel holds heavy climbing gear close to your back where it carries best. The Mountain Hardwear Splitter 40 Pack features 2 internal zippered pockets (1 fabric, 1 mesh) to hold and organize a harness, shoes and chalk bag.
short_description: The purpose-built Mountain Hardwear Splitter 40 Pack hauls your gear to the crag in comfort, then zips wide open and lays out flat to put everything you need at your fingertips.
